knimeNode.name: ExplorerBrowser
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows to browse the locations mounted in KNIME explorer and exposes the result as URL and absolute file path.

fullDescription.intro: Allows to browse the location mounted in KNIME Explorer and to specify the name of a file to be written there. The resulting file path and URL are exposed as flow variables and can be used be consecutive writer nodes to write to.
fullDescription.option: The URL of the KNIME Explorer location to write the file to.

ports.outPort: The variable values. The URL is exported as "explorer_url". If the URL can be resolved to a local file in addition the absolute path is exported as "explorer_path".
